name: Ext_R5_ClinicalUseDefinition_subject
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.ClinicalUseDefinition.subject for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version extension represents ClinicalUseDefinition.subject from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/ClinicalUseDefinition|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.short: The medication, product, substance, device, procedure etc. for which this is an indication
element.definition: `ClinicalUseDefinition.subject` maps to R4B `ClinicalUseDefinition.subject`. Type `Reference(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/NutritionProduct)` has no mapping Type `Reference(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/BiologicallyDerivedProduct)` has no mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.
